## Trashcan class

Class for a trash can.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Trashcan extends DeleteArea implements IAutoHideable, IPositionable 
```
**Extends:** [DeleteArea](./blockly.deletearea.md)

**Implements:** [IAutoHideable](./blockly.iautohideable.md)<!-- -->, [IPositionable](./blockly.ipositionable.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(workspace)](./blockly.trashcan._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Trashcan</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./blockly.trashcan.id.md) |  | string | The unique id for this component that is used to register with the ComponentManager. |
|  [isLidOpen](./blockly.trashcan.islidopen.md) |  | boolean | Current open/close state of the lid. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoHide(onlyClosePopups)](./blockly.trashcan.autohide.md) |  | Hides the component. Called in WorkspaceSvg.hideChaff. |
|  [click()](./blockly.trashcan.click.md) |  | Inspect the contents of the trash. |
|  [closeFlyout()](./blockly.trashcan.closeflyout.md) |  | Closes the trashcan flyout. |
|  [closeLid()](./blockly.trashcan.closelid.md) |  | Flip the lid shut. Called externally after a drag. |
|  [contentsIsOpen()](./blockly.trashcan.contentsisopen.md) |  | Returns true if the trashcan contents-flyout is currently open. |
|  [createDom()](./blockly.trashcan.createdom.md) |  | Create the trash can elements. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.trashcan.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this trash can. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [emptyContents()](./blockly.trashcan.emptycontents.md) |  | Empties the trashcan's contents. If the contents-flyout is currently open it will be closed. |
|  [getBoundingRectangle()](./blockly.trashcan.getboundingrectangle.md) |  | Returns the bounding rectangle of the UI element in pixel units relative to the Blockly injection div. |
|  [getClientRect()](./blockly.trashcan.getclientrect.md) |  | Returns the bounding rectangle of the drag target area in pixel units relative to viewport. |
|  [init()](./blockly.trashcan.init.md) |  | Initializes the trash can. |
|  [onDragExit(\_dragElement)](./blockly.trashcan.ondragexit.md) |  | Handles when a cursor with a block or bubble exits this drag target. |
|  [onDragOver(\_dragElement)](./blockly.trashcan.ondragover.md) |  | Handles when a cursor with a block or bubble is dragged over this drag target. |
|  [onDrop(\_dragElement)](./blockly.trashcan.ondrop.md) |  | Handles when a block or bubble is dropped on this component. Should not handle delete here. |
|  [openFlyout()](./blockly.trashcan.openflyout.md) |  | Opens the trashcan flyout. |
|  [position(metrics, savedPositions)](./blockly.trashcan.position.md) |  | Positions the trashcan. It is positioned in the opposite corner to the corner the categories/toolbox starts at. |
